ca.ualberta.cs.unter.controller

Class RequestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.unter.controller.RequestController

  • public class RequestController
extends java.lang.Object
    Request model's controller, a glue between Activity and Model. Give access for activity(View) to modify and update model.
